title: Move --session-id from PrepareForLaunch to Claude BuildCommandArgs
description:
--session-id is Claude Code-specific but currently returned from PrepareForLaunch as a prepend arg. The dry-run hardcodes it for all agents which is wrong.

Fix:
1. Add SessionID to CommandArgsConfig struct
2. In ClaudeCodeType.BuildCommandArgs, emit --session-id when SessionID is set
3. Remove --session-id from Claude adapter's PrepareForLaunch prepend args
4. Update Session.childArgs() to pass SessionID into CommandArgsConfig
5. Remove the hardcoded --session-id from dry_run.go resolveAgentConfig (it now comes from BuildCommandArgs)
6. Codex/Generic BuildCommandArgs ignore SessionID (no change needed)
